about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: This website is created in the context of a Masters Thesis at the Université Catholique de Louvain, undertaken by Marc Bejjani and Augusto Barbosa Villar Silva, under the supervision of Professor Benoît Macq.
about.paragraph2: This thesis explores how artificial intelligence can support non-drug interventions for people living with Alzheimer's disease (AD) through the use of visual stimuli and art. We present a prototype platform that combines large multimodal models (LMMs), large language models (LLMs), and embedding-based vector search to connect personal stories with curated artworks. Designed to assist memory recall and cognitive engagement, ArtEvoke generates personalized visual narratives or retrieves relevant paintings based on the user's story. Art is used not only as a memory trigger but also as a tool to promote emotional connection and engagement. The prototype is intended for testing in future therapeutic and research settings, particularly as a scalable support tool for caregivers and clinical practitioners. We evaluate model performance, retrieval effectiveness using FAISS, and user interaction design with a focus on accessibility. These findings highlight the potential of AI tools to support scalable cognitive stimulation in dementia care.

search.title: Art Exploration Instructions
search.description1: The art exploration tool allows you to search for art pieces by typing in some keywords. Our AI model will return some paintings from our database, and you can then select the one that you find most interesting, and the model will then generate a story based on it.
search.description2: Finally, if the generated story is not to your liking, you can choose to regenerate a new story, or start over.
search.description3: Before submitting, you can play with 2 options
search.instruction1: You can select the language that you used in order to help our model correct the spelling and translate to english
search.instruction2: You can choose one of 3 databases for our model to search from, giving you a wider array of results
search.enterKeywords: Enter some keywords to search for art!
search.imageSelectionDesc: Our AI model chose these paintings as the ones most resembling your input. Please **select one or more** of them to generate a story. Selected images will remain chosen across multiple searches.
search.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one image to generate a story.
search.loginToSave: Please log in to save the story to your account.
search.saveFailed: Failed to save the story. Please try again.

story.description: The memory reconstruction tool allows you to input a story or a memory (or part of it). After submitting the text, our AI model will segment the text and suggest the best matching painting per section from the selected database, which can hopefully help you remember more details of the story. If you are not satisfied with the given result, you can click on the "Show 5 images per section" button to generate even more images.
